about.name: About me
about.title: Who I am?
about.text: Hi, I'm César, a professional web and mobile systems developer with over 8 years of experience, specializing in creating APIs, graphical interfaces, and responsive, efficient, and integrated applications. My expertise spans front-end and back-end, enabling me to develop cross-platform mobile applications and dynamic web interfaces that deliver exceptional user experiences. With a solid foundation in Laravel, Node, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Mongo, MariaDB, and other back-end technologies, I have a holistic approach to building scalable, end-to-end solutions. My passion for innovation drives me to constantly learn and master new technologies, including IONIC and React Native Multiplatform, while striving to stay ahead of the ever-evolving technology landscape. From working on socket server utilities for real-time applications to custom systems, I've gained a deep understanding of the challenges and possibilities of modern application development. I'm a self-motivated problem-solver who thrives on bringing ideas to life through clean, efficient, and maintainable code. Let's build something amazing together!
